languages.text: "{name}". {n}Маражай сгибается в поклоне и поднимает голову, взирая снизу вверх.{/n} "Дозволь отнять мгновение твоего времени, Вольный Торговец. Я пришел, чтобы воздать тебе за твою заботу обо мне".

"{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."
languages.original_text: "{name}". {n}Маражай сгибается в поклоне и поднимает голову, взирая снизу вверх.{/n} "Дозволь отнять мгновение твоего времени, Вольный Торговец. Я пришел, чтобы воздать тебе за твою заботу обо мне".

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

"{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

"{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

"{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

languages.text: “{name}。”{n}玛拉斋弯腰鞠了一躬，随后抬起头，仰视着你。{/n}“请允许我占用你一点点时间，行商浪人。我希望能报答你对我的关心。”
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

traits.locale_text: “{name}。”{n}玛拉斋弯腰鞠了一躬，随后抬起头，仰视着你。{/n}“请允许我占用你一点点时间，行商浪人。我希望能报答你对我的关心。”

languages.text: 「{name}」{n}マラズハイはサッとお辞儀をして、下からこちらを見上げる。{/n}「少々時間をいただけるかな、自由開拓者殿。気遣いしてもらったお礼をしにきたんだが」
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}」{n}マラズハイはサッとお辞儀をして、下からこちらを見上げる。{/n}「少々時間をいただけるかな、自由開拓者殿。気遣いしてもらったお礼をしにきたんだが」

languages.text: «{name}». {n}Marazhai te ofrece una amplia reverencia y levanta la cabeza para mirarte sin incorporarse.{/n} «Permíteme un momento de tu tiempo, Comerciante Independiente. Vengo para compensar la atención que me has profesado».
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

traits.locale_text: «{name}». {n}Marazhai te ofrece una amplia reverencia y levanta la cabeza para mirarte sin incorporarse.{/n} «Permíteme un momento de tu tiempo, Comerciante Independiente. Vengo para compensar la atención que me has profesado».

languages.text: « {name}. » {n}Marazhai vous adresse une révérence, puis relève la tête et vous regarde par en dessous.{/n} « Si vous avez un petit instant à m'accorder, libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, j'aimerais vous rendre grâce pour la sollicitude que vous m'avez témoignée. »
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

traits.locale_text: « {name}. » {n}Marazhai vous adresse une révérence, puis relève la tête et vous regarde par en dessous.{/n} « Si vous avez un petit instant à m'accorder, libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, j'aimerais vous rendre grâce pour la sollicitude que vous m'avez témoignée. »

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai verbeugt sich vor dir, hebt den Kopf und schaut von unten zu dir auf.{/n} "Vergönnt mir einen Moment Eurer Zeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich bin hier, um mich für Euer Interesse zu revanchieren, das Ihr mir entgegengebracht habt."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai verbeugt sich vor dir, hebt den Kopf und schaut von unten zu dir auf.{/n} "Vergönnt mir einen Moment Eurer Zeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich bin hier, um mich für Euer Interesse zu revanchieren, das Ihr mir entgegengebracht habt."

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai, önünde diz çökerek başını kaldırıyor ve aşağıdan sana bakıyor.{/n} "İzninle bir dakikanı çalmak istiyorum Hür Tacir. Bana gösterdiğin ilginin karşılığını vermeye geldim."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai sweeps into a bow and raises his head, looking up at you from below.{/n} "Allow me to claim a moment of your time, Rogue Trader. I have come to repay the concern you have shown for me."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Marazhai, önünde diz çökerek başını kaldırıyor ve aşağıdan sana bakıyor.{/n} "İzninle bir dakikanı çalmak istiyorum Hür Tacir. Bana gösterdiğin ilginin karşılığını vermek için geldim."
